page.title: 19AMEMITIES IN CHURCHDOWN
page.content: There are many amenities in Churchdown including: a dentist,a Spar shop,a post office and a regular bus service.The dentist's surgery is in Albemarle Road.The Spar shop,which has already been named in the survey of shops on page 16 is situated opposite The Bat'n'Ball in Church Lane and acts as a mini supermarket for the village. The Post Office is situated in Blacksmiths Lane in the row of shops, with several post boxes scattered around the village. There's a fairly good bus service into Gloucester and also via the Reddings and Up Hatherley to Cheltenham.About 30 buses a day pass through the village and they run every day,except for Sunday, Christmas Day and Boxing Day.
